title: What's Love Got to do with It? / Love: for techies
summary:
What you think Love is - is (probably) wrong.

The correct metaphor / definition for live will make much more sense to
the software person. In fact, it will help with team building and design
too. Yup.

Grab a beer. I'll tell you a story about how this evolved (turing
machine example), how and where evolution selected it, and why it works
- and how it works for approaching problems (design) too.

Then I'll lay out the api (functional description).

Don't take it too seriously. You couldn't have known. Now you will.
Cheers!
